For some events, Zscaler may use third-party vendors to host an event online.
These vendors may have access to your information from time to time, solely for the purposes of producing the event.
This Privacy Policy ("Policy") explains how your information is collected, used and disclosed by Zscaler, Inc. and its subsidiaries ("Zscaler" or "We" or "Us"), and applies to information we collect when you use or access our online website at www.zscaler.com (the "Website"), when you access content we make available on our Website (the "Content"), or when you otherwise interact with us.

This information includes information such as IP addresses as well as browser type, internet service provider, URLs of referring/exit pages, operating system, date/time stamp, information you search for, locale and language preferences, identification numbers associated with your devices, your mobile carrier, and system configuration information.
We also gather certain information and store it in log files when you interact with the Website.
